name: The Tales of Fractals
description:
"Tales of Fractals" is a documentation about founding story of Fractal in a SHMUP  bullet-hell game form. Current state of the game is MVP (only 1 boss stage). In the future, we plan to add more ACTs

  • ACT #1 - Grape hack attack!
  • ACT #2 - SOLANA biggest airdrop
  • ACT #3 - Zombie wave!!
Controls | Game Mechanic // Movement : WASD | arrows, SPACE (slowdown) // Ultimates: 1 (HEXA), 2 (PENTA), 3 (QUAD), 4 (TRI)

Each Fractal faction will have unique super power to help the holder finish the game. More than 1 skill can be used at the same time.

  • HEXA: huge laser beam with high damage which also eats up enemy bullets
  • PENTA: small laser beam which also destroys enemy bullets
  • QUAD: protective shield
  • TRI: spread shot, this ultimate will be more useful for defeating a lot of enemies but not so useful to defeat single enemy

In the future update, we will utilize Fractal properties, for example

  • HEXA laser beam: POWER (damage), PURITY (laser duration), VELOCITY (player's speed), ALTITUDE (laser range)
  • PENTA laser beam: POWER (damage), PURITY (laser duration), VELOCITY (player's speed), ALTITUDE (laser range)
  • QUAD shield: POWER (only can destroy enemy's bullet which has lesser damage than the shield's power), PURITY (shield duration), VELOCITY (player's speed), ALTITUDE (shield's area)
  • TRI spread shot: POWER (damage), PURITY (spread shot duration), VELOCITY (player's speed), SPIN (will affect the spinning pattern of the spread shot), ALTITUDE (affect the radius of the area)
Vision

Our goal is to create bigger universe (called "Isekai") where "Tales of Fractals" will be one of the game that's available to be played in Arcade City (see the flowchart here) The Arcade City itself will be the game center for Fractalians. Every game studio / indie developer can showcase their game in a virtual retro arcade machine in the Arcade City. Hence, it will create "build-first" mentality which will make P2E gaming space more mature.

Follow our Twitter @IsekaiLand and join the revolution! WAGMI 🚀
